meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a liana.
meanings.sent1: The lianoid vines twisted around the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with lianoid plants climbing up the tall trees.
meanings.sent3: The lianoid vines played tug-of-war with the branches.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back like lianoid tendrils.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a maze of lianoid growth, creating a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of a liana.
meanings.sent1: The garden path was lined with lianoid plants, creating a natural archway.
meanings.sent2: The lianoid structure of the bridge allowed vines to climb and intertwine.
meanings.sent3: The lianoid design of the fence made it look like a living sculpture.
meanings.sent4: Her dress flowed around her like a lianoid garment.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated with lianoid patterns, bringing the outdoors inside.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a woody climbing plant.
meanings.sent1: The lianoid branches reached out in all directions, seeking sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The old house was covered in lianoid growth, giving it a mysterious appearance.
meanings.sent3: The lianoid plant seemed to be dancing in the wind.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a lianoid quality, weaving through the conversation effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The lianoid tendrils wrapped around the fence, creating a natural barrier.
